data.eml:eml: Description of Onthophagus humboldti and Uroxys bonplandi, two new scarab beetles (Coleoptera, Scarabaeidae, Scarabaeinae) from Costa Rica, with notes on tropical mountain brachyptery and endemicity

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kohlmann, Bert, Solis, Angel, Alvarado, Guillermo E. (2019): Description of Onthophagus humboldti and Uroxys bonplandi, two new scarab beetles (Coleoptera, Scarabaeidae, Scarabaeinae) from Costa Rica, with notes on tropical mountain brachyptery and endemicity. ZooKeys 881: 23-51, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.881.38026, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.881.38026
